values: today went pretty well i think, we'll see what the scale says tomorrow!

scale this morning said 110.5! i thought it was going to say like, 114 at the least @_@ okie dokie... so my goal of 100lbs in 2 weeks seems a little more achievable : ) I can do this, i'm so happy...still feel terrible about the pills...but I think it's a small price to pay for perfection. When i'm ready, i'll go like...buy alot of things there and give a big tip or something? maybe that would make me feel better, anyway, I hope everyone is doing well.

~This is for ED only~
1. Name:loveforbones
2. Age:16
3. Location:ct
4. Gender:F
5. Height:5'3"
6. Current Weight:113
7. Highest weight:about 136
8. Lowest weight:110
9. BMI (http://nhlbisupport.com/bmi/bmicalc.htm): 20
10. Short term goal (& put date): 110 by May 3rd
11. Long term goal (& put date): 95-ish by late August
12. What ED you have: ana
13. How long have you had it: i've always had body image problems and have been dieting since i was maybe in the 5th grade. 
14. Do people catch on that you have one: my mom knew something was up when she found diet pills in my room. 3 times.
15. Have you been diagnosed/do you self-diagnose? self
16.What is your favourite bone? ribs
17. In your opinion, is anorexia a disease or a lifestyle choice? disease.
18. Who/what is your 'thinspiration': my boyfriend. he's about 6ft and says he's 135lbs, but he looks less...so skinny...beautiful.
19. Have you ever been treated for your eating disorder? no,
20. What are you hoping to get out of this community? just need a place to talk
21. Must post atleast ONE (1) picture of yourself: you can IM me for one if you want,
22. What is your AIM/AOL screen name: loveforbones (AIM)

112 as of this morning :D
hehe..oh god, i'm in class and i have to pee. lol. oh well. im just happy i'm down a lb, i know that might not seem like much to some of you, but it means alot to me
